content.LostItemQuest_DefaultThankYou: คุณหามันเจอ! ขอบคุณมาก
content.NewChild_SecondChild1: แค่มองไปที่ ครอบครัวเล็กๆ ของเรา... เรามาไกลมาก มิใช่รึ?
content.NewChild_SecondChild2: ลูกที่น่ารักสองคน... เรามาไกลมาก มิใช่รึ?
content.NewChild_Adoption: ยินดีต้อนรับ {0} เจ้าตัวเล็กสู่ครอบครัวของเรา มันยอดเยี่มมาก
content.NewChild_FirstChild: ทุกอย่างผ่านไปอย่างราบรื่น ตอนนี้ {0} เป็นสิ่งเล็กๆ ในครอบครัว, เราโชคดีมากที่มีหนูน้อย
content.Spouse_KitchenBlocked: เรามีกล้วยไม้กีดขวางที่ห้องครัว....ฉันเดาว่าคืนนี้คุณคงไม่ได้ทานอาหารค่ำ.$a
content.Spouse_MonstersInHouse: อาห์... ที่รัก? ทำไมมอนสเตอร์มาอยู่ในบ้านของเราได้ล่ะ?
content.Farm_RobinWorking_ReadyTomorrow: {0} จะเสร็จวันพรุ่งนี้! น่าตื่นเต้นใช่ไหมล่ะ?
content.Farm_RobinWorking1: {0} จะเสร็จในอีก {1} วัน. นี่เธอทำเป็น ตี๋ต่างว่าฉัน ไม่อยู่นี่ด้วยนะ
content.Farm_RobinWorking2: {0} จะเสร็จใน {1} วัน. ฉันจะทำงานนี้ให้ ทั้งกลางวันและกลางคืน!
content.AnimalShop_Marnie_Trash: ทำไมเธอถึงได้มอง ถังขยะของฉันล่ะ?$s
content.JoshHouse_Alex_Trash: หืม.. คุณกำลังทำอะไร?$s
content.SamHouse_Sam_Trash: เฮ้, อย่ามองลงไป ในนั่น!$a
content.SeedShop_Abigail_Drawers: ไง, ไม่ได้คิดถึงมันเลย! นี่เป็นที่ส่วนตัว!$a
content.Wizard_Hatch: คุณจะทำอะไร? ฉันอนุญาตเฉพาะคนที่ไว้ใจเท่านั้นให้เข้ามาได้
content.Clint_NoInventorySpace: เฮ้ อุปกรณ์ของเธอเสร็จแล้ว แต่เธอไม่มีพื้นที่ สำหรับไว้เก็บมัน
content.Clint_StillWorking: อืม ฉันยังคงทำงาน {0} ให้เธออยู่ไงล่ะ มันคงไม่เสร็จ วันนี้หรอก
content.Gunther_MuseumComplete: ขอขอบคุณอีกครั้ง สำหรับทุกความช่วยเหลือ ของคุณที่ทำให้ พิพิธภัณฑ์ดูน่าทึ่ง ได้ขนาดนี้!
content.Gunther_NothingToDonate: ดูเหมือนว่าคุณ ไม่มีอะไร ที่จะบริจาคให้กับทาง พิพิธภัณฑ์. มันจะดีกว่านี้ ถ้าคุณไม่อยู่ที่นี่ และทำบางอย่าง เช่นการล่าสมบัติ, หน่ะครับ?
content.Gunther_NoArtifactsFound: สวัสดีครับ! ยินดีต้อนรับสู่ 'ศูนย์โบราณคดี Stardew Valley'.#$b#อืม... นี่อาจจะเป็นเรื่องน่าอาย, เพราะผู้ดูแล คนก่อนหน้านี้ เป็นผู้กำกับดูแล คอลเล็กชันทั้งหมด. เราจึงยังไม่มี Artifacts สำหรับแสดง.#$b#ผมคิดว่า จะแก้ปัญหาได้ เร็วๆนี้! เอ่อคุณครับ, หากคุณพบ Artifacts หรือ แร่ธาตุต่าง ๆ ... กรุณาแจ้งให้ ทางเราทราบได้หรือไม่?
content.Sandy_PlayerClubMember: เกิดอะไรขึ้น? คุณเป็นสมาชิกของสโมสร?!
content.MisterQi_PlayerClubMember: It's good to finally meet ya, kid. Welcome to my exclusive clubhouse.#$e#You've got the 'spark'... that's why I singled you out.#$e#What spark? Ah... The conduit of mystery, of art...#$b#People like us have a responsiblity to keep the world alive, to give folks a taste of the extraordinary.#$e#You see, kid... The world's like a bowl of rice. It's got substance, but it ain't worth nothin' without a good, zesty sauce. That's where we come in.#$b#Didn't you ever wonder who put those treasure chests in the old mineshaft? I like to give people surprises.#$e#You'll understand someday. Just keep doing your best and never give up.
content.Robin_HouseUpgrade_Accepted: ขอบคุณ! ฉันจะเริ่มงาน ในวันพรุ่งนี้. ฉันว่างานคงเสร็จ ภายใน 3 วัน
content.Robin_PamUpgrade_Accepted: ด้วยความ ใจกว้างของเธอ! ฉันจะเริ่มงาน อัพเกรด ในวันพรุ่งนี้. อาจต้องใช้เวลา ประมาน 3 วัน
content.Mines_PlayerKilled_Robin: ...พบเธอ หมดสติในเหมือง. ฉันเกือบเข้าใจผิด เห็นเธอเป็นท่อนไม้ แปลกๆ ซะอีก!#$b#ระมัดระวัง ในครั้งต่อไปด้วย, ตกลงไหม?$s
content.Mines_PlayerKilled_Clint: ...ฉันพบคุณ หมดสติในเหมือง. ฉันคิดจะระเบิด ทางออก, เพื่อลากคุณ ออกไปจากที่นี่#$b#ระมัดระวัง ในครั้งต่อไปด้วย, โอเคร?$s
content.Mines_PlayerKilled_Maru_Spouse: ...พบเธอ หมดสติในเหมือง. เธอหายไปนานมาก และฉันเริ่ม เป็นห่วงคุณ!#$b#ระมัดระวัง ในครั้งต่อไปด้วย, ตกลงไหม?$s
content.Mines_PlayerKilled_Maru_NotSpouse: ...ฉันพบคุณ หมดสติในเหมือง. ฉันกำลังหาแร่อยู่ และเกือบที่จะเหยียบ ศีรษะของคุณแล้ว!#$b#ระมัดระวัง ในครั้งต่อไปด้วย, ตกลงไหม?$s
content.Mines_PlayerKilled_Linus: ...ฉันพบคุณ หมดสติในเหมือง. คุณโชคดีแล้ว ที่ฉันผ่านมา เจอเข้า!#$b#ระมัดระวัง ในครั้งต่อไปด้วย, โอเคร?$s
content.Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_PlayerMale: คุณหายตัวไปนาน ฉันรู้สึกห่วงมาก! ฉันรู้สึกไม่ดีเลยที่เห็นร่างกายคุณอ่อนล้า...$s
content.Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_PlayerFemale: คุณหายตัวไปนาน ฉันห่วงใยคุณนะ! ฉันเกือบจะมีอาการหัวใจวายเมื่อเห็นร่างคุณอ่อนล้า...$a
content.Morris_PlayerSignedUp: Excellent! Welcome to Joja Corporation! Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting started on some community development projects... Oh, and don't forget your wallet! Hehe.#$b#Now, let me call Mayor Lewis and see about gutting that nasty old community center...
content.Morris_ComeBackLater: กลับมาในวันพรุ่งนี้และเราจะเห็นการเริ่มต้นการพัฒนาหมู่บ้านบางส่วน...เพียงแต่อย่าลืมนำเงินมาให้มากๆ นะ ฮิฮิ
content.Morris_Greeting: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#I don't believe we've met. I'm Morris, Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative.#$b#When you decide you want to become a Joja Member, I'll be delighted to help make your transition a joyous experience.
content.Morris_WeekendGreeting: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#We're currently in the process of setting up a brand-new membership system for our customers. Please check back soon to join!
content.Morris_FirstGreeting: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#We're currently in the process of setting up a brand-new membership system for our customers. Please check back soon to join!
content.Morris_WeekendGreeting_MembershipAvailab: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... Mayor Lewis promised us that if anyone else joined up, he'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
content.Morris_FirstGreeting_MembershipAvailable: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... Mayor Lewis promised us that if anyone else joined up, he'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
content.Morris_WeekendGreeting_SecondPlayer: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#Hmm... Our records show that you live on a farm with some other folks... I'm sorry, but we can only sell a membership to the owner of your residence.
content.Morris_FirstGreeting_SecondPlayer: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#Hmm... Our records show that you live on a farm with some other folks... I'm sorry, but we can only sell a membership to the owner of your residence.
content.Morris_StillProcessingOrder: We're currently processing your last Community Development order. Please come back after the work is complete.
content.Morris_CommunityDevelopmentForm_PlayerMa: $q -1 -1#I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, sir. Care to take a look?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes#$r -1 -1 No#No
content.Morris_CommunityDevelopmentForm_PlayerFe: $q -1 -1#I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, miss. Care to take a look?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes#$r -1 -1 No#No
content.PurchasedItem_1_QualityHigh: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by Pierre's the other day and bought {1} {2}. It was the first time I've seen one of those there in a while... #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit!$h#$b#I'm glad Pierre's stock is starting to expand again.#$e# Anyways...

It was the first time I've seen one of those there in a while... #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where Pierre found that thing.$s#$e# Anyways...
content.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. I'm impressed.
content.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh_Jodi: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. As soon as I smelled it I was back in Granny's old cottage...

content.PurchasedItem_3_QualityLow_Rude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# It was {4}! No wonder Pierre was selling that {5} for so cheap...
content.PurchasedItem_3_QualityHigh_Rude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only{3}g.#$e# It was actually pretty {4}.
content.PurchasedItem_3_NonRude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# I couldn't pass up that great price.
content.PurchasedItem_4: So I was at the store the other day and Pierre showed me {1} {2} you brought in.#$e#I bought it.$h
content.PurchasedItem_5_VegetableOrFruit: I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. #$b#He said that he grew the thing in his own backyard. I didn't know Pierre was such a talented farmer!$h#$b#Looks like you might have some competition, huh?
content.PurchasedItem_5_Cooking: I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. #$b#He said he cooked the thing himself using local ingredients. I didn't know Pierre was such {3} {4} chef!
content.PurchasedItem_5_Foraged: I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. He said he found it himself while exploring the mountains. I didn't know Pierre was such a talented forager!
content.PurchasedItem_Teen: Hey, so I picked up {2} at the store last night. My mom wanted something good for dinner.
content.PurchasedItem_Abigail_QualityLow: Hey. We had one of those {2}s you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out.$h#$bUnfortunately it tasted like {3}.$s
content.PurchasedItem_Abigail_QualityHigh: Hey. We had one of those {2}s you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out.$h#$bIt was still pretty good, though.
content.PurchasedItem_Caroline_QualityLow: Oh, @... This is embarrassing. I threw one of your {2}s you sold us into my compost bin.$s#$b#Now the whole thing smells horrendous. Where did you find that thing again?
content.PurchasedItem_Caroline_QualityHigh: Oh, @... This is embarrassing. I threw one of your {2}s you sold us into my compost bin.$s#$b#But on the bright side, the worms are really loving it! They've never looked happier!
content.PurchasedItem_Pierre_QualityLow: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.#$b#I can't say it was a hit... $s#$b#... well,... back to business, huh?
content.PurchasedItem_Pierre_QualityHigh: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.#$b#My wife loved it! ...And Abby even started going to town on it after I smothered the thing in hoisin sauce. $h#$b#... well,... back to business, huh?
content.PurchasedItem_Haley: Emily พยายามช่วยฉัน {1} {2}สำหรับมื้อค่ำในทุกๆ คืน...ฉันโยนมันทิ้งตอนที่เธอมองทางอื่น#$e#ฉันไม่ชอบอาหารสุขภาพ...$s
content.PurchasedItem_Elliott: ฉันเห็น Pierre มีสินค้าใหม่ {2} ในวันอื่น! วิเศษมาก มันมีกลิ่นหอมที่สมบูรณ์แบบ...และมั่นคงเช่นกัน!
content.PurchasedItem_Alex: Hey, so I picked up {1} {2} at the store last night. Grandma made her special casserole...
content.PurchasedItem_Leah: The other day I bought {1} {2} at Pierre's. It was perfect on a bed of greens and a dash of my 'special' vinaigrette.

content.SkullCavern_100_event: clubloop/-100 -100/farmer 6 6 2 MrQi 10 7 0/specificTemporarySprite qiCave/removeQuest 30/viewport 10 7 true/pause 3500/speak MrQi "Well, well, well... you made it."/pause 500/playSound boop/faceDirection MrQi 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection MrQi 2/pause 100/playSound boop/animate MrQi false false 100 0 1 2 3 3 3 2 1 0/pause 1500/speak MrQi "Come closer, now... don't be shy."/emote farmer 40/playSound boop/pause 500/move farmer 0 4 1/move farmer 4 0 0/pause 500/stopJittering/speak MrQi "I heard you were attempting a deep dive into these caverns today...#$b#I had to see for myself!"/animate MrQi false false 100 0 1 2 3 3 3 2 1 2 3 3 3 2 1 0/pause 1000/playSound boop/pause 1000/speak MrQi "Impressive... very impressive. Making it all the way down here is quite a feat!#$b#...although you did skip a bunch of levels by crafting staircases. Clever, sure... but not very honorable.$1#$b#Even so, it must have been a lot of work to mine all that stone. And that sort of dedication is praiseworthy. You're a rare one, kid."/pause 500/speak MrQi "Now... go over to the table and drink this special milk I've prepared for you."/pause 500/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 8/speak MrQi "It's called 'Iridium Snake Milk'... one healthy swig of that and you'll become even more powerful."/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/specificTemporarySprite removeSprite 803/farmerEat 803/awardFestivalPrize qimilk/pause 2000/message "The taste is awful, and the texture is even worse."/pause 100/pause 500/jump farmer/playSound reward/message "... But your health is permanently increased by 25!"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/playSound boop/speak MrQi "Good luck out there, kid."/pause 500/playSound boop/end
content.SkullCavern_100_event_honorable: clubloop/-100 -100/farmer 6 6 2 MrQi 10 7 0/specificTemporarySprite qiCave/removeQuest 30/viewport 10 7 true/pause 3500/speak MrQi "Well, well, well... you made it."/pause 500/playSound boop/faceDirection MrQi 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection MrQi 2/pause 100/playSound boop/animate MrQi false false 100 0 1 2 3 3 3 2 1 0/pause 1500/speak MrQi "Come closer, now... don't be shy."/emote farmer 40/playSound boop/pause 500/move farmer 0 4 1/move farmer 4 0 0/pause 500/stopJittering/speak MrQi "I heard you were attempting a deep dive into these caverns today...#$b#I had to see for myself!"/animate MrQi false false 100 0 1 2 3 3 3 2 1 2 3 3 3 2 1 0/pause 1000/playSound boop/pause 1000/speak MrQi "Impressive... very impressive. You passed my test with flying colors, kid.#$b#I'm very pleased that you challenged yourself and came down the honorable way, instead of skipping all the levels by crafting staircases.#$b#That shows you're the real deal, kid. You've got principles.#$b#You understand the importance of challenging yourself, and holding yourself to the highest standard, even if no one is watching.#$b#That's why you're special, kid... see? You lead by example. I like that."/pause 500/speak MrQi "Now... go over to the table and drink this special milk I've prepared for you."/pause 500/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 8/speak MrQi "It's called 'Iridium Snake Milk'... one healthy swig of that and you'll become even more powerful."/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/specificTemporarySprite removeSprite 803/farmerEat 803/awardFestivalPrize qimilk/pause 2000/message "The taste is awful, and the texture is even worse."/pause 100/pause 500/jump farmer/playSound reward/message "... But your health is permanently increased by 25!"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/playSound boop/speak MrQi "Good luck out there, kid."/pause 500/playSound boop/end
